string-array.name: welcome_notes_content
string-array.item: "Create a note Tap the plus to create a note."
"Choose templates Use templates to change backgrounds and styles of your notes. Tap the right button at the bottom of the note to choose a template."

"Create folders Organize your notes in folders. There are 2 ways to create a folder: 1. Tap the folder icon in the upper right corner, and then tap the plus. 2. Hold a note until a pop-up menu appears, and choose \"Move to\" - \"New folder\"."

"Hide notes Protect private notes with a password. There are 2 ways to hide a note: 1. Tap the \"More\" button in the upper right corner of a note, and select \"Hide\". 2. Hold a note until a pop-up menu appears, and select \"Hide\"."

"And more great features! Â - Images, checklists, reminders.
Add images Tap the image icon at the bottom of a note to add an image. You can take a photo or choose one from the Gallery. When a note contains an image, this image will be used as the note's miniature in grid view.
Create checklists Checkbox is an essential element of a to-do list. Tap the checkbox icon at the bottom of a note to add a checkbox to a paragraph of text. Check the box when the stuff is done.
Set reminders Set reminders directly from notes. Tap the \"More\" button in the upper right corner of a note, select \"Reminders\", set the time. "
